name: Connect The Top Ball Spots
description:
Do you think you have what it takes to solve the puzzle? If you're into complicated puzzles and mind games of the good kind, you'll love this game! The perfect game to bend your mind over and over, you won't stop until you've won...and then you'll want to do it again!

The rules sound simple: just connect the colors that match. Of course, nothing's ever really that easy and this game is no exception! You'll have to use your creative and critical thinking skills to match all the colors and cover the board. Don't look now, but your brain just got pushed a little harder!

Is your brain up to the task? There's only one way to find out! Start playing now!

It's so addictive, you won't want to stop. With multiple levels and stimulating music and sound effects, you'll have tons of fun with this brain teaser. Challenge yourself, challenge a friend, and challenge your brain!

Features:
* Great for all ages
* Amazing graphics
* Universal app supports iPhone / iPad / iPod Touch
* Addictive Gaming

Download right now!
